abstract: In comments filed with the F.C.C., Google outlined plans for low-power devices that use local wireless airwaves to access the “white space” between television channels.
snippet: In comments filed with the F.C.C., Google outlined plans for low-power devices that use local wireless airwaves to access the “white space” between television channels.
lead_paragraph: Google proposed a plan on Monday that may let wireless Internet devices use vacant television airwaves without interfering with current equipment.

headline.main: Google Plan Would Open TV Band for Wireless Use
headline.print_headline: Google Plan Would Open TV Band for Wireless Use

abstract: Yahoo joins the OpenSocial alliance, and Google transfers control over the group it created to a non-profit foundation.
snippet: Yahoo joins the OpenSocial alliance, and Google transfers control over the group it created to a non-profit foundation.
lead_paragraph: As anticipated, Yahoo is joining the Google-led OpenSocial alliance, which is developing a common set of standards for programmers to create applications that can run on social networks and other sites.

headline.main: Yahoo Joins Social Network Group, as Google Gives Up Control
